content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (position x=-5.0, y=2.5) - fueled with coal
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=6.5)
- Electric poles (positions x=4.5, y=6.5; x=0.5, y=8.5)
- Connected with pipes for water and steam transport

### Iron Mining and Smelting Area at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill 1 (position x=15.5, y=70.5)
- Electric mining drill 2 (position x=18.5, y=70.5)
- Electric mining drill 3 (position x=21.5, y=70.5)
- Stone furnace 1 (position x=16.0, y=74.0) - contains 1 iron plate
- Stone furnace 2 (position x=19.0, y=74.0) - contains 1 iron plate
- Stone furnace 3 (position x=22.0, y=74.0) - contains 1 iron plate
- Inserters between drills and furnaces (positions x=15.5, y=72.5; x=18.5, y=72.5; x=21.5, y=72.5)
- Power poles (positions x=15.5, y=68.5; x=19.5, y=76.5; x=17.5, y=72.5; x=23.5, y=72.5; x=14.5, y=76.5)
- Output chest for iron plates (position x=19.5, y=77.5)
- Inserter for iron output (position x=16.5, y=76.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting Area at position (-66.5, 75.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill 1 (position x=-66.5, y=75.5)
- Electric mining drill 2 (position x=-63.5, y=75.5)
- Stone furnace 1 (position x=-66.0, y=79.0) - contains 10 copper plates
- Stone furnace 2 (position x=-63.0, y=79.0) - contains 7 copper plates
- Inserters between drills and furnaces (positions x=-66.5, y=77.5; x=-63.5, y=77.5)
- Power poles (positions x=-64.5, y=81.5; x=-64.5, y=77.5; x=-64.5, y=73.5)
- Output chest for copper plates (position x=-64.5, y=82.5)

### Science Pack Assembly Area at position (-9.5, 57.5)
Consists of:
- Gear assembling machine (position x=-9.5, y=57.5) set to produce iron gear wheels
- Science pack assembling machine (position x=-3.5, y=57.5) set to produce automation science packs
- Iron input chest (position x=-12.5, y=57.5)
- Copper input chest (position x=-3.5, y=54.5) with inserter (position x=-4.5, y=55.5) - contains 50 copper plates
- Science pack output chest (position x=-3.5, y=60.5) with inserter (position x=-3.5, y=59.5) - contains 25 automation science packs
- Inserter to feed iron plates to gear assembler (position x=-11.5, y=57.5)
- Gear output inserter (position x=-7.5, y=57.5) - rotated to face RIGHT
- Gear chest (position x=-6.5, y=56.5) - contains 4 automation science packs
- Ground to chest inserter (position x=-6.5, y=57.5) - rotated to face RIGHT
- Chest to science inserter (position x=-5.5, y=56.5) - rotated to
